title: Microsoft Entra Connect Version 2.4.129.0 is now available
description: On January 15, 2025, we released Microsoft Entra Connect Sync Version 2.4.129.0 that supports auditing administrator events. More details are available in the release notes. We will autoupgrade eligible customers to this latest version of Entra Connect in February 2025. For customers who wish to be auto-upgraded, ensure that you have auto-upgrade configured.
